scripts.dev-visual: microbundle watch visual-test/main.ts --output visual-test/dist/index.js --external none --format modern,cjs
scripts.build-pack: rimraf dist && microbundle src/index.ts --output dist/index.js --format modern,cjs && ncp package.json dist/package.json && npm run ~pack-dist
scripts.dev-pack: rimraf dist && microbundle src/index.ts --output dist/index.js --format modern,cjs --sourcemap --no-compress && ncp package.json dist/package.json && npm run ~pack-dist
